mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FIREMEN.PERSONAL_TRAINING (MBR_SEQ, TRN_SEQ, PT_RESERVATION_DATE, PT_RESERVATION_STATUS) VALUES (#{mbrSeq}, #{trnSeq}, #{ptReservationDate}, #{ptReservationStatus})
INSERT INTO FIREMEN.PERSONAL_TRAINING_REVIEW (PT_SEQ, PTR_CONTENT, PTR_RATING) VALUES (#{ptSeq}, #{ptrContent}, #{ptrRating})
mapper.select: SELECT PT_SEQ, TRN_SEQ, MBR_SEQ, PT_CREATION_DATE, PT_RESERVATION_DATE, PT_LESSON_DURATION, PT_LESSON_START_DATE, PT_LESSON_END_DATE, PT_RESERVATION_STATUS, PT_CANCELLATION_REASON, PT_NOTES, Reservation_Order FROM ( SELECT PT_SEQ, TRN_SEQ, MBR_SEQ, PT_CREATION_DATE, PT_RESERVATION_DATE, PT_LESSON_DURATION, PT_LESSON_START_DATE, PT_LESSON_END_DATE, PT_RESERVATION_STATUS, PT_CANCELLATION_REASON, PT_NOTES, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TRN_SEQ ORDER BY PT_RESERVATION_DATE DESC) AS Reservation_Order FROM FIREMEN.PERSONAL_TRAINING WHERE MBR_SEQ = 1 ) WHERE PT_SEQ = #{ptrSeq}

SELECT PT_SEQ,PT_RESERVATION_DATE,PT_RESERVATION_STATUS,MBR_NAME FROM FIREMEN.PERSONAL_TRAINING JOIN FIREMEN.MEMBER ON MEMBER.MBR_SEQ = PERSONAL_TRAINING.MBR_SEQ WHERE TRN_SEQ = #{trnSeqL} AND TO_CHAR(PT_RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
